statements: SELECT * FROM restaurants;
SELECT name, location FROM restaurants;
SELECT name FROM restaurants WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM restaurants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE restaurant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM restaurants ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT restaurant_id, name FROM restaurants WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE name LIKE 'M%' AND location IS NOT NULL
SELECT restaurant_id, name, location FROM restaurants WHERE name = 'Pizza Hut'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_restaurants FROM restaurants
SELECT name, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Mexican' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE rating < 3.0;
SELECT id, name, location, cuisine, rating FROM restaurants ORDER BY rating ASC, name;
SELECT name, cuisine, rating FROM restaurants WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine='Italian' AND location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)
SELECT name, location, rating FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine IN ('Japanese', 'Mexican') ORDER BY location ASC, rating DESC
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(location, POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)) < 5000
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT restaurant_id, name, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM user_reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 'a8f5bca8-0a1d-4fd2-87c3-65a63d1c2099';
SELECT restaurant_id, name, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' AND location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE user_id = '1ab0ce0f-6f07-48e8-b0d3-130a872c3452' AND rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.name, ur.review_text FROM users u INNER JOIN user_reviews ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN restaurants r ON ur.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE u.location IS NOT NULL AND r.cuisine = 'Japanese' ORDER BY ur.review_id ASC;
SELECT restaurant_name, location_point FROM Restaurants;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_name, cuisine_pref FROM Users JOIN UserPreferences ON Users.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id;
SELECT user_name, restaurant_name FROM Users JOIN Favorites ON Users.user_id = Favorites.user_id JOIN Restaurants ON Favorites.restaurant_id = Restaurants.restaurant_id;
SELECT restaurant_id, restaurant_name, distance FROM Restaurants ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Restaurants WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY restaurant_name DESC;
SELECT restaurant_name, location_point FROM Restaurants WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location_point, 'POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)') < 1000;
SELECT user_name, cuisine_pref FROM Users JOIN UserPreferences ON Users.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id WHERE cuisine_pref = 'Italian';
SELECT Users.user_name, COUNT(Favorites.restaurant_id) AS total_favorites FROM Users LEFT JOIN Favorites ON Users.user_id = Favorites.user_id GROUP BY Users.user_name ORDER BY total_favorites DESC;
SELECT MAX(distance) AS max_distance, MIN(distance) AS min_distance FROM Restaurants;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT restaurant_id, name FROM Restaurants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, cuisine_preference FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM RestaurantReviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM Restaurants WHERE name LIKE '%Pizza%';
SELECT user_id, cuisine_preference FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT r.name, rc.category_name FROM Restaurants r JOIN RestaurantCategories rc ON r.restaurant_id = rc.restaurant_id;
